attributes.action: Reimburse third term accommodation payment for all University students
attributes.additional_details: Reimburse students of third term accommodation fees or no payment at all as many are home due to the government advising them to stay in doors as the country might go into lockdown. And therefore use the student loan for food during the crisis.
attributes.background: Reimburse all students of third term accommodation fees as most have gone home due to the Corona virus and universities are still making students pay even though they aren’t living there due to the situation at the moment.
